titles.title: Family Farm Tax Simplification Act of 2003
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to simplify the application of self-employment tax in the case of family farming businesses.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/25/2003--Introduced. Family Farm Tax Simplification Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from treatment as a partnership a qualified farming joint venture conducted by a jointly-filing husband and wife. Provides that income, gain, loss, deductions, and credits shall be equally divided, and treated as if attributable to a trade or business conducted by each spouse as a sole proprietor.Defines "qualified farming joint venture."Amends the Code and the Social Security Act to treat such income as net earnings from self-employment, respectively.
